text: Iti kho bhikkhave avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ pe evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti
edit: Iti kho bhikkhave avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ pe evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti

translations.transtext: Thus, monks, with ignorance as condition, volitional activities [occur]; ...
